name: Cooking Daddy (Bardon)
description:
You applied for a job at a gas station. But this is special: Gas stations today have more than gas for cars. You can buy necessary things and food. But this gas station has a delivery service, too. The 'Cooking Daddy' cooks meals and you must deliver it.

For the first day you must deliver six meals.  But you must be fast! Before you take the first job, look out the city and their flags. Each house has a colored flag, these you must remember!

And don't forget to use the shift-key to run!!!
